name: tm79
effect: Teaches Dark Pulse to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Frost Breath to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Dark Pulse)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user blows its cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user blows its cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user blows its cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.
